parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count of items to return. Default: 10

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter by email. Can't be used with query

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Filter by username. Can't be used with query

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search by username or email. Can't be used with email or username

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Array of ids to exclude separated by comma

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count of items to return. Default: 10
